text: Never forget. While the Republican Senate refused to extend $600/week for 30 million unemployed workers, it had no problem passing a $1 trillion tax break to the top 1% and large corporations. Trump and the Republicans love socialism for the rich, rugged capitalism for the rest.

If you haven’t yet read this awful story about what’s happening at the @USPS, do it now. This problem isn't only about delayed ballots – it's about people’s health and safety, and risks to our economy. We must keep fighting to #SaveThePostOffice. https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2020-08-20/usps-cutbacks-post-office-chaos

California is on fire. Once in a lifetime hurricanes are sweeping the Gulf Coast. The Arctic topped 100 degrees. The future of our planet is at stake this election. We can no longer have a president in office who rejects science and calls climate change a hoax. #GreenNewDeal

Any proposal that doesn’t include a plan to stop the #coronavirus, feed America, or prevent mass evictions that the President’s executive action sideshow did nothing about is just a distraction. 

Sabotage of the postal service worsens these dire needs. #DontMessWithUSPS http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1297545818547912706/pu/img/8NC8eNHUAqZEmiZI.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1297545818547912706/pu/vid/480x270/18xImd7xnMpWobZ5.mp4?tag=10

Both are a direct challenge to what makes America spe­cial

Our country has witnessed more than six months of widespread suffering and grief. 

Yet this Administration is still ignoring our public health crisis from the #coronavirus that is also at the root of our crushing economic crisis. 

Even as the death toll climbs to 175,000. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1297576895425511426/pu/img/uC6okwebl97hp266.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1297576895425511426/pu/vid/480x270/4A6VyCDazSG7MC01.mp4?tag=10

Federal Minimum Wage in 2009: $7.25/hr
Federal Minimum Wage in 2020: $7.25/hr

Total Wealth of U.S. Billionaires in 2009: $1.27 trillion
Total Wealth of U.S. Billionaires in 2020: $3.63 trillion

Our job: Tax the rich and increase the minimum wage to at least $15 an hour.

If there's going to be a class war in this country, it's time the working class won that war. We can no longer tolerate 3 billionaires owning more wealth than the bottom 50%. We must tax the obscene gains billionaires made in the pandemic and create an economy that works for all.

Donald Trump is the most anti-science and anti-environment president our nation has ever known. It’s destroying our climate and destroying our communities.

The climate crisis is an existential threat—and we can’t afford four more years of denial and sabotage.

Just 55 percent of Black male athletes from the power 5 conferences graduate within six years. How many days must American families and frontline heroes go without desperately-needed support before Republicans in Congress are ready and willing to act?

Donald Trump’s ignorance and incompetence have always put our country in grave danger. COVID-19 was his biggest test yet—and he failed miserably. This crisis requires real leadership, and @KamalaHarris and @JoeBiden will be the leaders we need.

Our country is witnessing an all-out assault on the right to vote ahead of this year’s election. Ever since the Supreme Court gutted the Voting Rights Act in 2013, attempts to suppress the vote have increased across the country.

We have to fight this with everything we’ve got. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1297527084580036615 QT @washingtonpost Tennessee adopts new law that could strip some protesters of voting rights https://trib.al/96vF5jp

I’ve been guided by the words I spoke from the first time I stood in a courtroom: Kamala Harris, For the People.

I’ve fought for survivors of sexual assault.
I’ve fought against transnational criminal orgs. 
I took on the biggest banks.

And I know a predator when I see one.

100 days.

That's how long ago the House passed a bill to extend $600 a week to 30 million unemployed workers, $1,200 for the working class, hazard pay and $25 billion for the Post Office.

During this time, the Senate passed a $740 billion Pentagon budget and took a vacation.

RT @ASP Announcing the lineup of this week's #ASPChat at the #RNC. Stay tuned each night at 6PM (ET) for a talk with lawmakers and @ChrisEvans & @MarkKassen Go to http://astartingpoint.com tomorrow for @lisamurkowski and later this week with @SenCoryGardner @SenTedCruz & @HerreraBeutler http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgHv2KKWsAA4neq.jpg

My heart is with the victims of the devastating California wildfires tonight, as well as the people of the Gulf Coast and Puerto Rico in the paths of Hurricane Marco and Tropical Storm Laura. The federal government must do everything it can to help these communities.

I want to thank Utah firefighters who arrived in California today to help with devastating wildfires in our state. They’re joining firefighters from across the country who have stepped up to help California in our moment of need. https://twitter.com/FireAuthority/status/1297249112656494592 QT @FireAuthority To the firefighters in Ca, Utah is here to help! 

This morning 33 firefighters across the state left to assist California in their wildfire suppression efforts in a state to state Emergency Assistance Compact (EMAC) request. Good luck and stay safe! 

🎥: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d77LbqqY6vw&feature=youtu.be http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgDBMRQUMAAtSAl.jpg
